dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S400 IS: Corps of Engineers Recreation Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Boozman (for himself and Mr. Merkley) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to include the Corps of Engineers as a Federal land management agency, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Corps of Engineers Recreation Improvement Act.

subsection.text: Section 802 of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act (16 U.S.C. 6801) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking and after the semicolon;
by adding at the end the following:
the Secretary of the Army, with respect to the Corps of Engineers.

paragraph.text: in paragraph (11), by inserting , the Secretary of the Army, after Interior.

subsection.text: Section 803 of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act (16 U.S.C. 6802) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (f), in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by inserting the Corps of Engineers, after Reclamation,; and
in subsection (g)(2), in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by inserting the Corps of Engineers, after Land Management,.
